## **Introduction**

This report explores global **vaccination coverage[^1]** This report explores the critical role of vaccination in enhancing public health. Our analysis shows that between **2000 and 2023,** global vaccination coverage increased by **20%**, while average life expectancy rose by 10 years. Regional data reveals that countries with strong economic and healthcare support achieve vaccination rates above **90%**, compared to around 70% in less resourcedÂ nations.
